File Upload

There is nothing that needs to be uploaded here unless you have had a Qualifying Event. A Qualifying Event is marriage, divorce, death, birth/adoption of a child, loss of coverage, etc. You would need to upload proof of the Qualifying Event. In addition to uploading the documents, you will need to send an email to benadmin@tri-starsystems.com to let them know about the Qualifying Event.

Note: We will only accept the following file formats (extensions) for files up to 3 MB in size:
.JPG .TIF .GIF .PDF .DOC .DOCX .XLS .XLSX .CSV – Do NOT upload .zip files or password-protected files.

  1. All pages to one file on your computer
    Save all supporting documentation to one file, if possible.
  2. Optional Comments
    If you wish to add an optional comment, please upload only 1 file, the file associated with the comment. Otherwise, the comment will be associated with the first file received. You’ll be able to upload more documents, thereafter.
  3. Select the file to upload to Tri‐Star
    Click the Choose File or Browse button below and select the file you saved.
  4. Upload the file to Tri‐Star
    Click the Upload button below to securely transfer your file to us.
